title: ☠️ L̸̤͌u̶͛͛c̷̀́í̷̜f̵̄̀e̵̕͠r̷ ⛥
desc:
Post 797
- Is a kitten
- Can also be played whenever you want
- Will steal cards from the host if the host had cards and you may play the cards immediately no matter what
- If you pet him then you gain one shield, but draw one card. Drawing of the card does not affect the shield
- If you make the owner draw a card, **☠️ L̸̤͌u̶͛͛c̷̀́í̷̜f̵̄̀e̵̕͠r̷͋̀ ⛥** will die
